code: @Bean @ConditionalOnMissingBean public SendGrid sendGrid(SendGridProperties properties) {     if (properties.isProxyConfigured()) {         HttpHost proxy = new HttpHost(properties.getProxy().getHost(), properties.getProxy().getPort()).         return new SendGrid(properties.getApiKey(), new Client(HttpClientBuilder.create().setProxy(proxy).build())).     }     return new SendGrid(properties.getApiKey()). }
